name: Adaptability
description: Powers up moves of the same type as the PokÃ©mon.

name: Aerilate

name: Aftermath
description: Damages the attacker if it contacts the PokÃ©mon with a finishing hit.

name: Air Lock
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Analytic
description: Boosts move power when the PokÃ©mon moves last.

name: Anger Point

name: Anticipation
description: The PokÃ©mon can sense an opposing PokÃ©mon's dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap

name: Aroma Veil

name: Aura Break

name: Bad Dreams

name: Battery

name: Battle Armor

name: Battle Bond
description: Defeating an opposing PokÃ©mon strengthens the PokÃ©mon's bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

name: Beast Boost
description: The PokÃ©mon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a PokÃ©mon.

name: Berserk

name: Big Pecks

name: Blaze

name: Bulletproof
description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from some ball and bomb moves.

name: Cacophony
description: Avoids sound-based moves.

name: Cheek Pouch

name: Chlorophyll
description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in sunshine.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon's moves or Abilities from lowering the PokÃ©mon's stats.

name: Cloud Nine
description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

name: Color Change
description: The PokÃ©mon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

name: Comatose
description: It's always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

name: Competitive
description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat is lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
description: The PokÃ©mon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

name: Contrary

name: Corrosion

name: Cursed Body

name: Cute Charm
description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may cause infatuation.

name: Damp
description: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

name: Dancer
description: When another PokÃ©mon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

name: Dark Aura
description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Dark-type moves.

name: Dazzling
description: Surprises the opposing PokÃ©mon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Defeatist

name: Defiant
description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.

name: Delta Stream
description: The PokÃ©mon changes the weather to eliminate all of the Flying type's weaknesses.

name: Desolate Land
description: The PokÃ©mon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

name: Disguise
description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the PokÃ©mon can protect it from an attack.

name: Download
description: Compares an opposing PokÃ©mon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk statâ€”whichever will be more effective.

name: Drizzle
description: The PokÃ©mon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

name: Drought

name: Dry Skin

name: Early Bird
description: The PokÃ©mon awakens twice as fast as other PokÃ©mon from sleep.

name: Effect Spore

name: Electric Surge
description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the PokÃ©mon enters a battle.

name: Emergency Exit

name: Fairy Aura
description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Fairy-type moves.

name: Filter
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Flame Body

name: Flare Boost

name: Flash Fire

name: Flower Gift

name: Flower Veil
description: Ally Grass-type PokÃ©mon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

name: Fluffy

name: Forecast

name: Forewarn

name: Friend Guard

name: Frisk

name: Full Metal Body
description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon's moves or Abilities from lowering the PokÃ©mon's stats.

name: Fur Coat
description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

name: Gale Wings

name: Galvanize

name: Gluttony

name: Gooey

name: Guts

description: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Healer

name: Heatproof

name: Heavy Metal

name: Huge Power

name: Hustle

name: Hydration

name: Illuminate

name: Illusion

name: Infiltrator

name: Insomnia

name: Iron Barbs
description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with iron barbs.

name: Justified

name: Klutz

name: Leaf Guard

name: Light Metal

name: Lightning Rod

name: Magnet Pull

name: Merciless

name: Mold Breaker

name: Motor Drive
description: Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.

name: Overcoat

name: Overgrow

name: Parental Bond

name: Pickpocket

name: Pickup
description: The PokÃ©mon may pick up the item an opposing PokÃ©mon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

name: Prankster

name: Prism Armor
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Quick Feet

name: Reckless

name: Simple

name: Skill Link

name: Slow Start

name: Slush Rush

name: Sniper

name: Symbiosis

name: Tangled Feet

name: Tangling Hair

name: Technician

name: Telepathy

name: Teravolt

name: Torrent

name: Tough Claws

name: Toxic Boost

name: Triage
